articles.description: WWE has announced that Sheamus has suffered an injury following his latest match with Solo Sikoa on "WWE SmackDown."
articles.content: The most recent episode of "WWE SmackDown" saw Solo Sikoa defeat Sheamus in singles action, with interference from The Bloodline aiding the young star in defeating the grizzled veteran. However, what… [+1537 chars]

articles.title: Netflix's 'The Watcher' home in New Jersey attracts unwanted attention: 'Crackpots' - Fox News
articles.description: Netflix's new mystery series, 'The Watcher,' has attracted some unwanted attention to a street in the historic New Jersey town of Westfield, according to local reports.
articles.content:
Residents of Westfield, New Jersey, are being haunted by tourists stopping through town to check out the real-life home featured in the new Netflix mystery series "The Watcher."
